mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Closed with Mr. Perry and signed clause for conveyance of land in his name; encloses letter from Mr. Lee regarding stocking weaver; asks him to show it to Mr. Leitch and anyone else interested; has carnation cherries if he is interested in sending for them.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1817 June 23, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to Mr. Garrett, n.p.
